messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/9/2003 11:38:57 AM Eastern Standard Time, ... Hee hee !! Now if I can just get his name out there and I d be willing to bet he d cut
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/9/2003 11:38:57 AM Eastern Standard Time,
ecsamhill@... writes:

> **We reminded her, he DOES
> {he makes custom countertops and cabinets}**
>
> If only homeschoolers had more money, we'd be a terrific side market.
> Pretty much every homeschooling mom I know dreams of having some nice
> carpenter come to her house and create built-in, floor-to-ceiling
> bookcases. (I want mine with that ladder that slides along the front. <g>)
>
> Betsy
Hee hee !! Now if I can just get his name out there and I'd be willing to bet he'd cut homeschoolers a break. LOL His boss retired unexpectedly early in Oct { his business started as just a hobbie} and with the holidays and wonderful economy it's been slow going getting customers.
But it just takes time. :-)Tracy
